update s_qc set deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptname = #{deptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptpid = #{deptpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deptpname = #{deptpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jssb = #{jssb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qcbh = #{qcbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, provider = #{provider,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, azsj = #{azsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qcxz = #{qcxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfbf = #{sfbf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gzms = #{gzms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hcc = #{hcc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mfwhqx = #{mfwhqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aqsyqx = #{aqsyqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dljd = #{dljd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dlwd = #{dlwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdeleted = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select q.id, deptid,d.simplename deptname , deptpid,jssb, qcbh, provider, azsj, qcxz, sfbf, gzms, hcc, mfwhqx, aqsyqx,dljd,dlwd, createtime, updatetime, isdeleted from s_qc q,dept d where q.deptid=d.id
and deptid = #{deptid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and jssb like CONCAT('%',#{jssb},'%')
and isdeleted=0 order by createtime desc
